name: previewer-platform
description: Content evaluation platform with Solana payments and real human feedback

scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:user && npm run install:worker
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:user" "npm run dev:worker"
scripts.build: npm run build:user && npm run build:worker
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:user" "npm run start:worker"
scripts.db:push: cd backend && npx prisma db push
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:user && npm run lint:worker
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:user && npm run clean:worker
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run db:generate && npm run db:push

author: Previewer Team
